message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SI, cs.IR

This paper is likely to belong to the arXiv CS sub-category of cs.CL (Computation and Language) as it deals with natural language processing and text analysis to detect fake news. The use of causal graphs and probability distributions also suggests a connection to the sub-category of cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The paper also involves machine learning techniques, which could place it in the sub-category of cs.LG (Machine Learning). The focus on information trustworthiness and classification could also relate to the sub-categories of cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval).
